attributes.action: upgrade e-petitions to allow, and report on, opposition as well as support
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow users to express opposition to a petition, so that petitions effectively become polls. Show counts and lists of those opposed alongside those in favour. Show the ratio of those in favour to those opposed and offer this as a sort key in search results.

rejection.details: This has been dealt with in our faqs: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
